author: Dr. D. J. Christopher, Dr. Prathap Tharyan
title: Masks are mandatory for all now
description: The COVID-19 pandemic is now a major threat to global health and economy, the full impact of which is yet unknown. The case load and deaths are gradually mounting in India too, especially over these p
content: The COVID-19 pandemic is now a major threat to global health and economy, the full impact of which is yet unknown. The case load and deaths are gradually mounting in India too, especially over these past weeks. These figures may have been substantially higher… [+12287 chars]
